nodes.text: "Antarian Rangers" was the third preview of Hero's Guide, a Star Wars Roleplaying Game sourcebook written by Rodney Thompson and J.D. Wiker and published by Wizards of the Coast. The preview detailed the history of the Antarian Rangers and rules for featuring them in a campaign using the Star Wars Roleplaying Game Revised Core Rulebook. The article was released on July 10, 2003 on the Wizards of the Coast website.
